definition: to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
sacrifice to drive away calamity/to dispel/to drive away/to remove

sentences.english: Its traditional function include eliminating wind and strengthening bones and muscles.
sentences.chinese: 的乾燥根皮，其傳統功能爲祛風溼，強筋骨。

sentences.english: The Chinese traditional medicine that who can offer dehumidify of my dispel the wind prescription?
sentences.chinese: 誰可以提供給我祛風除溼的中藥方子？

sentences.english: This medicine with the effect of removing pathogenic wind and dampness can cure arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 這種祛風散寒的藥適用於關節炎。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effects of Qufeng Zhiyang tincture on anti-allergic and anti-pruritus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究祛風止癢酊的抗過敏與止癢作用。

sentences.english: The crux of the matter is how to comprehensively treat this trend.
sentences.chinese: 各種風溼病的治療關鍵是祛風散寒。

sentences.english: This unguent relieves rheumatism, chills and pains, and is fit for use By rheumatism sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 本藥膏除溼散寒，祛風定痛，適合風溼病人使用。

sentences.english: To observe the influence of blood-nourishing and wind-expelling therapy on the therapeutic effect of epidermic grafting for vitiligo.
sentences.chinese: 觀察養血祛風法對錶皮移植術治療白癜風療效的影響。

definition: to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
